```{r}
set.seed(12345)

library(ggplot2)
```

```{r 1.2}
MM = 357
NN = 158
MN = 485
pop = 1000

p = sqrt(MM/pop)
q = sqrt(NN/pop)
pq = (MN/pop)/2

#assuming p is correct:
qe = 1-p
pqe_p = p*qe 

chi_test_p = (q-qe)^2/qe + (pq-pqe_p)^2/pqe_p
print(chi_test_p)

#assuming q is correct:
pe = 1-q
pqe_q = pe*q
chi_test_q = (p-pe)^2/pe + (pq-pqe_q)^2/pqe_q
print(chi_test_q)



```
